Class ControlPanel

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--java.awt.Component
        |
        +--java.awt.Container
              |
              +--java.awt.Panel
                    |
                    +--ControlPanel
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, java.util.EventListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.event.ItemListener, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable
public class ControlPanel
extends java.awt.Panel
implements java.awt.event.ItemListener

Class ControlPanel. Constructor sets up three radio buttons, adds event listener, and adds buttons to checkbox group. Class completely rewritten to use Java 1.1 event model.

See Also:
Serialized Form
